topics.body:
"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54382422636872765a620100#post_54382422636872765a620100
I actually had an idea for a devil fruit from one the SBS things Oda does. He was talking about somehow evolving pens for body parts because he's a professional manga-ka. I call it the Pen-Pen Fruit. You can turn any part of your body into a sharp calligraphy pen and spray ink out of it as well. But using too much ink leaves you dehydrated and only one part of your body can be a pen at a time.


God I'm such a dork.
